next.excerpt: It is very simple and minimalist, but it works. This is a widget application that displays actions to be taken right now. Recommended for smartphone addicts. It is a tool for productivity, but I recommend writing down what you need to do right now.
next.title: Wyd? - An iOS widget to encourage you to do one thing
